title: Harvest report: Heat wave hastens ripening
content:
September 16, 2015

			
 
"Some folks, including ourselves, will be dealing with the ash that is on the fruit and how to keep that out of the fermenters," added Pat Stotesbery of Ladera Vineyards on Howell Mountain. "As of (Monday) morning everyone is nervous about the fire and hoping for the best."
